definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] a drawing, drawing up, a trail;—
cstr. [[מֶשֶׁךְ חָכְמָה מִפְּנִינִים]] Job 28:18 the drawing up(fishing up, i.e. securing after effort) of wisdom is beyond corals.
cstr. a trail (of seed), [[הַזׇּ֑רַע]] ´[[מֶ]] Ps 126:6 bearing the trail of seed ; cf. [[מָשַׁח]]
